content: What is your opinion about BTC and low priceIs this the beginning of the end or just bad period

comments.author: ForMeritt
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on June 18, 2022, 12:11:57 PMWhat is your opinion about BTC Only people who are in complete control will know the specials of Bitcoin. a little explanation from me Bitcoin is the only coin that is the best among other good coins.Quote from: markvin on June 18, 2022, 12:11:57 PMApakah ini awal dari akhir atau hanya periode yang burukHey friends, this is not the end of Bitcoin because this is exactly what the bad conditions are going through, and if you say this low price is true if we look and measure it with the Bitcoin price at the highest number, but if you look at it from the beginning Bitcoin is still very expensive, because you are a newcomer and you don't really know the history of Bitcoin.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on June 18, 2022, 12:11:57 PMWhat is your opinion about BTC and low priceIs this the beginning of the end or just bad periodBeginning of what end? Aren't you been told about how bitcoin operates and the nature of it volatile moves, why will there be a created panic out of nothing on something that does not loose value but only moves in price base on the same economy demand and supply for good and commodities which is only an ordinary room to open for new investors as a result of low in demand and high supply, maybe you're once a victim from altcoins scams and think this also applies to bitcoin but i can tell you vividly that you're wrong, bitcoin still remains valuable and is only gathering momentum for a speedy move up

comments.author: Awwal08
comments.body: Bitcoin, I believed, will rise again; it was just going through a rough patch. Bitcoin's decline is not the end of the story.What happens to bitcoin when it falls in value has ramifications in all facets of life. A country might be in recession for a long time and then recover by more than 50%. As a result, never quit up in the event of a bitcoin crash. It will climb above our expectations once more.

comments.author: onecall123
comments.body: As it stands, this is what it is. You can take it or leave it. There is no choice but to hold at this time. It's appealing that there is so much confidence, yet no one knows what's going to happen. A bounce back was expected at 20k, but unfortunately we have not been able to secure levels. I'll wait to see if the daily closure passes, but if it doesn't, the next target appears to be lower. Let's hope BTC bounces back. A new day brings a new depth. Hopefully, I'll see green days soon after buying it. Stay strong and take advantage of the opportunity! At those convenient psychological levels, stop losses will always be triggered, 18k and 19k seem more appropriate.

comments.body: Quote from: markvin on June 18, 2022, 12:11:57 PMWhat is your opinion about BTC and low priceIs this the beginning of the end or just bad periodAnd why the topic totally different from the actual content! And as for what my opinion is on btc, I don't see anything different from what we already know, maybe this time will be a little aggressive than previous bear market but in the end btc always comes out stronger than before. This is not the end so you should stop worrying, this is a period you should take advantage of I wouldn't say bad.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: We've already endured these market crashes from time to time. There are many bear market happenings over the past decade and this one is not an exception despite the big correction after reaching the all-time high mark of $68,000 last year. I know it'll come back for sure, but we should always be prepared for unexpected circumstances along the way because these kinds of bearish will continue as usual.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Minecache on June 18, 2022, 02:50:43 PM1BTC is still 1BTC as long as you haven't sold them you still have nothing to lose.$1 equals $1 as well.  1 pubic hair still equals 1 pubic hair.  Crazy how that works.  I'd give as a rebuttal that the BTC I sold a couple of months ago are worth 3 BTC now.  While it's fun to pretend there's a Bitcoin standard, there just isn't.  It's as speculative investment as a person can make.  I'm pro-Bitcoin, but I hope people realize that the guys who are telling you 1 BTC equals 1 BTC are the ones also taking their companies public and trading their entire Bitcoin existence for massive amounts of dollars, or trying to use those Bitcoin to get people to give them dollars to manage it for them, which they will charge dollars for.  Don't be a fool.  Bitcoin isn't about having nothing to lose, it's about protecting what you do have.  We've gotten way off course.  I hope a drop to $10K acts as a course correction.

comments.author: STT
comments.created_time: June 18, 2022, 08:21:30 PMLast edit: June 18, 2022, 09:55:58 PM by STT
comments.body: BTC price action is continually below the 12hr average, thats quite aggressive negative.  We did attempt the 2 day average briefly but it failed, at that point be ready for a test of support which we have done and resolved downwards.Weekend going into week start will I presume retest this loss of 19k or so.   Once thats checked we alternate to find the boundary below us and so on, its about the market finding its way through the dark back to a known path and greater confidence.

comments.author: KennyR
comments.body: Everything looks to be on the cyclic move. We don't know when this can return back on bullish track. Came across a thread in which it is mentioned about the price crash happening before 1.5 years before the scheduled halving. Now it is the same time period and for that reason price can increase slowly. The cyclic pattern putforth have got coincidence with the real-time movement in the market.Based on technical parameters too, the market is found to have a negative move. So, this is the time for investment keeping focus the future growth.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on June 18, 2022, 12:11:57 PMWhat is your opinion about BTC and low priceIs this the beginning of the end or just bad periodIt’s obviously just a bad period. The question is how bad will it get and how long will the period last. I would urge caution from those who want to rush into the market. A downtrend like this usually hits bottom and has an accumulation period that can last a year or more. There’s plenty of time to get in. Don’t get burned trying to catch a falling knife. Especially with leverage.
